User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_7_2) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.121 Safari/535.2

Steps to reproduce:

Created a few custom fields that are all "Field only appears when product is x".

Selected change several bugs at once from a search result page that contained bugs from only a single product (y).


Actual results:

Had the ability to change the value of custom fields (drop down and multi-select) for custom fields that were created as "Field only appears when product is x", but all my bugs are for product y.


Expected results:

I would have expected the custom fields to not be visible since they didn't apply to the product of the bugs.
